name: Thunder force Heaven
description:
Here is a small demo of my Fan Game Thunder Force. If you like it, do not hesitate to write a little comment, it gives me force to pursuit the development.

Control:

It is highly recommended to use the Keyboard-Mouse combo !

  • Shoot: Left click / Spacebar
  • Change weapon: Right click / C key
  • Change speed: Right Control / V button
  • Movement: up, down, left, right key

Warning: The Hunter weapon shoots in the direction of the mouse pointer

I hope you will have a little fun ;)

Credits is located at the bottom left of the start screen. But as a reminder :
Main developer : Triganov
Sprites : Ansimuz, Aamatniekss, Craftpix
Other sprites, music, sounds are from Thunder force series, Axelay, Sonic the Hedgehog, Rock'n'roll racing, R-Type and Demon's crest

Note: This project has no other purpose than developing a Thunder Force game, no commercial will
